original_text: Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Your people have killed God's prophets. And they have thrown stones to kill other people that God has sent to you. Many times, I have wanted to bring all of your people near to me. A female bird covers her babies with her body to make them safe. But you would not let me keep you from danger like that.
korean_text: 예루살렘아 예루살렘아 선지자들을 죽이고 네게 파송된 자들을 돌로 치는 자여 암탉이 제 새끼를 날개 아래에 모음 같이 내가 너희의 자녀를 모으려 한 일이 몇 번이냐 그러나 너희가 원하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: Your people have killed God's prophets.
And they have thrown stones to kill
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 죽이기 위해 돌을 던졌다.

sentences.original_text: other people that God has sent to you.
to bring all of your people near to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모든 백성을 내게 가까이 오게 하기를.

sentences.original_text: A female bird covers her babies with her body
sentences.korean_translation: 암컷 새는 새끼들을 자기 몸으로 덮는다.

sentences.original_text: But you would not let me
keep you from danger like that.
